member.name: M:Dawnx.Ranges.IntegerRange.Create(System.Int32)
member.summary: The range type represents an immutable sequence of numbers and is commonly used for looping a specific number of times in for loops.

member.name: M:Dawnx.Ranges.IntegerRange.Create(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: The range type represents an immutable sequence of numbers and is commonly used for looping a specific number of times in for loops.

member.name: M:Dawnx.Ranges.IntegerRange.Create(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: The range type represents an immutable sequence of numbers and is commonly used for looping a specific number of times in for loops.

member.name: M:Dawnx.Sequences.LetterSequence.GetNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the number of letter. It's start at 0. (For example, "A" is 0).

member.name: M:Dawnx.Sequences.LetterSequence.GetLetter(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the letter of number. It's start at "A". (For example, 0 is "A").

member.name: M:Dawnx.Utilities.IPUtility.GetLongString(System.Net.IPAddress)
member.summary: Converts a into a long IP string.

member.name: M:Dawnx.Utilities.ObjectUtility.GetPropertyDictionary(System.Object)
member.summary: Gets a from an anonymouse type.

member.name: M:Dawnx.Utilities.ObjectUtility.GetPropertyPureDictionary(System.Object,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Gets a from an anonymouse type.

member.name: T:Dawnx.JSend.Error`1
member.summary: There was a problem with the data submitted, or some pre-condition of the API call wasn't satisfied.

member.name: P:Dawnx.JSend.Error`1.message
member.summary: Required Key: A meaningful, end-user-readable (or at the least log-worthy) message, explaining what went wrong.

member.name: P:Dawnx.JSend.Error`1.code
member.summary: Optional Key: A numeric code corresponding to the error, if applicable.

member.name: P:Dawnx.JSend.Error`1.data
member.summary: Optional Key: A generic container for any other information about the error, i.e.the conditions that caused the error, stack traces, etc.

member.name: T:Dawnx.JSend.Fail`1
member.summary: There was a problem with the data submitted, or some pre-condition of the API call wasn't satisfied.

member.name: P:Dawnx.JSend.Fail`1.data
member.summary: Required Key: Provides the wrapper for the details of why the request failed. If the reasons for failure correspond to POST values, the response object's keys SHOULD correspond to those POST values.

member.name: T:Dawnx.JSend.Success`1
member.summary: All went well, and (usually) some data was returned.

member.name: P:Dawnx.JSend.Success`1.data
member.summary: Required Key: Acts as the wrapper for any data returned by the API call. If the call returns no data, data should be set to null.
